title: 85/32/EEC: Commission Decision of 7 December 1984 rejecting a programme on the marketing of cattle submitted by North Rhine-Westphalia pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 (Only the German text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 7 December 1984
rejecting a programme on the marketing of cattle submitted by North Rhine Westphalia pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77
(Only the German text is authentic)
(85/32/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The programme on the marketing of cattle submitted by North Rhine Westphalia and forwarded on 10 May 1984 by the Government of the Federal Republic of Germany pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 is hereby rejected.
This Decision is addressed to the Federal Republic of Germany.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 December 1984.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 51, 23. 2. 1977, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 180, 7. 7. 1984, p. 1.
